author: Posted At Am On February
title: UH-OH! Video surfaces of Bill Maher condoning sex between an adult and a 14-year-old – twitchy.com
text:
— warrior cop (@wyatt_privilege) February 22, 2017 
And we should remind everyone that Maher has said much worse: for those sharing the " @billmaher 's similar argument to Milo's" video, there's also this fun bit… 
— Asawin Suebsaeng (@swin24) February 22, 2017 … @billmaher (has repeatedly) said he'd rather get molested by Michael Jackson than beat up by school bullies, & that kids touching Jackson… 
— Asawin Suebsaeng (@swin24) February 22, 2017 …isn't as bad as Jackson touching the kids! Here's Maher is saying it and angering Craig Ferguson in 2005: https://t.co/lh2DBp1oK0 
— Asawin Suebsaeng (@swin24) February 22, 2017 Trending Jake Tapper, @ReaganBatallion respond to Milo Yiannopoulos--George Takei comparison 
Maher even took credit for Milo’s fall: Bill Maher, criticized for booking Milo Yiannopoulos, takes credit for his fall: "Sunlight is the best disinfectant" https://t.co/tojXn8jQLU pic.twitter.com/FfCVcqtCf0 
— The New York Times (@nytimes) February 22, 2017 
So, should Bill Maher face the same punishment as Milo? Over to you, HBO! 
***
